languages.text: {n}На расшитом золотыми нитями камзоле красуется искусно изображенная аквила в окружении звезд. Звезды мерцают — каждая своим самоцветом. Удивительная роскошь для губернатора мира, лишенного света цивилизации.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На расшитом золотыми нитями камзоле красуется искусно изображенная аквила в окружении звезд. Звезды мерцают — каждый своим самоцветом. Удивительная роскошь для губернатора мира, лишенного света цивилизации.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На расшитом золотыми нитями камзоле красуется искусно изображенная аквила в окружении звезд. Звезды мерцают — каждая своим самоцветом. Удивительная роскошь для губернатора мира, лишенного света цивилизации.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by stars. The stars glitter, each made from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

{n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by stars. The stars glitter, each made from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

{n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}总督的金边夹克上，精巧地绣着双头鹰的图案。双头鹰被闪闪发光的群星环绕着，所有星星都是用各自不同的宝石切割而成的。考虑到这个世界并没有被文明的灯火照亮，这件夹克称得上是非同凡响的奢侈品。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}总督的金边夹克上，精巧地绣着双头鹰的图案。双头鹰被闪闪发光的群星环绕着，所有星星都是用各自不同的宝石切割而成的。考虑到这个世界并没有被文明的灯火照亮，这件夹克称得上是非同凡响的奢侈品。{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督の金糸で刺繍された上着には、巧みに描かれたアクィラがあしらわれ、その周囲にはきらめく星々が円を描いている。それぞれの星は異なる種類の宝石から切り出されており、文明の光さえ届かぬこの惑星を統治する者としては、実に贅を極めた装いだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督の金糸で刺繍された上着には、巧みに描かれたアクィラがあしらわれ、その周囲にはきらめく星々が円を描いている。それぞれの星は異なる種類の宝石から切り出されており、文明の光さえ届かぬこの惑星を統治する者としては、実に贅を極めた装いだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La chaqueta bordada en oro del gobernador está decorada con una Aquila de buena factura rodeada por estrellas rutilantes, cada una de las cuales ha sido tallada con un tipo de gema distinto; un lujo desmesurado tratándose de alguien que gobierna un mundo tan alejado de la luz de la civilización.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La chaqueta bordada en oro del gobernador está decorada con una Aquila de buena factura rodeada por estrellas rutilantes, cada una de las cuales ha sido tallada con un tipo de gema distinto; un lujo desmesurado tratándose de alguien que gobierna un mundo tan alejado de la luz de la civilización.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Valinin altın işlemeli ceketi; her biri farklı türde değerli bir taştan kesilmiş parıldayan yıldızlarla çevrili, ustaca işlenmiş bir Çift Başlı Kartal'a ev sahipliği yapıyor. Bu, medeniyetin ışığından yoksun bir dünyayı yöneten biri için dikkate değer bir lüks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Valinin altın işlemeli ceketi; her biri farklı türde değerli bir taştan kesilmiş parıldayan yıldızlarla çevrili, ustaca işlenmiş bir Çift Başlı Kartal'a ev sahipliği yapıyor. Bu, medeniyetin ışığından yoksun bir dünyayı yöneten biri için dikkate değer bir lüks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La veste brodée d'or du gouverneur est ornée d'une habile représentation de l'Aquila cernée d'étoiles taillées dans des gemmes différentes. Un vêtement d'un luxe surprenant pour quelqu'un qui gouverne un monde dépourvu des lumières de la civilisation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La veste brodée d'or du gouverneur est ornée d'une habile représentation de l'Aquila cernée d'étoiles taillées dans des gemmes différentes. Un vêtement d'un luxe surprenant pour quelqu'un qui gouverne un monde dépourvu des lumières de la civilisation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die goldbestickte Jacke des Gouverneurs ziert ein aufwendiger Aquila, der von funkelnden Sternen umgeben ist, die aus verschiedenen Edelsteinen geschliffen wurden ... ein beachtlicher Luxus für den Gouverneur einer Welt, der das Licht der Zivilisation verwehrt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's gold-stitched jacket bears a skilfully depicted Aquila encircled by glittering stars, each of which has been cut from a different type of gemstone — a remarkable luxury for someone who governs a world devoid of the light of civilisation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die goldbestickte Jacke des Gouverneurs ziert ein aufwendiger Aquila, der von funkelnden Sternen umgeben ist, die aus verschiedenen Edelsteinen geschliffen wurden ... ein beachtlicher Luxus für den Gouverneur einer Welt, der das Licht der Zivilisation verwehrt ist.{/n}
